trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_SEQ_00<tab>Peshekwa is beaming at you.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Upon speaking with Peshekwa, several cutscenes will play in sequence.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_SYSTEM_200_001<tab>It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_PESHEKWA_000_001<tab>Welcome back. And may I congratulate you on Wuk Lamat's victory in the rite of succession.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_PESHEKWA_000_002<tab>It is our great honor to host the comrades of our future Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_PESHEKWA_000_003<tab>Such a grand journey has doubtless left you fatigued. Please relax and enjoy your stay.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>Some time later...
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_020<tab>Surprised to see me? I suppose it's only natural...
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_021<tab>May I come in?
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_022<tab>I haven't properly thanked you.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_023<tab>That my sister was able to realize her potential is testament to the quality of her traveling companions. Particularly you.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_024<tab>For that, you have my heartfelt gratitude.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_A1_000_001<tab>I only did as you might have in my position.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_A1_000_002<tab>Wuk Lamat did all the work. I was just moral support.

TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_025<tab>My primary business in calling is to deliver a message from Lamaty'i. As you well know, after the ascension ceremony she will officially take up the mantle of Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_026<tab>She has expressed a desire for you to accept a post within her administration...
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_027<tab>...while making no mention of me.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_028<tab>You needn't decide immediately. My sister will broach the matter with you again after the ceremony.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_029<tab>Whether you continue to assist Lamaty'i or not is up to you.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_030<tab>That is all. If you'll excuse me.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_031<tab>...You have become someone irreplaceable to her. As her brother, I acknowledge that with no little jealousy.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KOANA_000_032<tab>But believe me when I say that I hope you will stay by her side.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_ERENVILLE_000_050<tab>She might have told <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> what she was planning...
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_ERENVILLE_000_051<tab>But Wuk Lamat does not act without the best interests of her people in mind.

TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_ALPHINAUD_000_052<tab>The Head of Reason was very wise indeed to devise something so elaborate and meaningful as the rite of succession. 'Tis a shame he could not be here to bear witness to the end.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_ALISAIE_000_053<tab>A bittersweet celebration to be sure, but I'm glad Wuk Lamat finally got the recognition she deserves.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KRILE_000_054<tab>Wuk Lamat was brilliant up there, wasn't she?
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KRILE_000_055<tab>The part with the Second Promise was surprising, but between the two of them, I daresay our new Dawnservants will be capable of anything.
TEXT_KINGMC114_04910_KRILE_000_056<tab>The future of Tuliyollal is bright indeed.
